title: Rodney Brooks, Founder Of Rethink Robotics
teaser: Jessica Harris speaks with Rodney Brooks, founder of Rethink Robotics, a company that makes robots for the manufacturing industry. Harris also speaks with Netspend founders Betrand and Roy Sosa.
contentencoded:
Jessica Harris speaks with Rodney Brooks, founder of Rethink Robotics, a company that makes robots for the manufacturing industry. Harris also speaks with Netspend founders Betrand and Roy Sosa.
